overview.title: About Ring Size Converter
overview.content: Our ring size converter will help you accurately determine what size you need when ordering jewelry from abroad. Simply enter your size or the inner diameter of the ring, and you'll get a conversion table for RU, EU, US, UK, JP and CN systems.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All sizes are converted based on the inner diameter of the ring in millimeters. Each system has its own standards, but they are all tied to a single diameter, ensuring accurate conversion between countries.

measurement.title: How to Measure Ring Size
measurement.content: To measure ring size, you can use the inner diameter of an existing ring or measure the circumference of your finger. All measurements must be accurate to get the correct size.

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate size tables, instant conversion, support for 6 size systems, user-friendly interface, mobile version.

faqItems.q: How to find ring size by diameter?
faqItems.a: Measure the inner diameter of the ring with a ruler or caliper ‚Äî the calculator will automatically convert the value to international sizes.

faqItems.a: Enter ¬´RU¬ª and your size ‚Äî the service will instantly show the equivalent for EU, US, UK, JP, CN systems.

faqItems.q: Is the calculator suitable for wedding rings?
faqItems.a: Yes, it is suitable for all types of rings ‚Äî wedding, engagement and everyday rings.

faqItems.q: How accurate are the size tables?
faqItems.a: All tables are based on international ring size standards and are regularly updated to ensure accuracy.
